MtkSetRegionByGenericMapInfo.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*===========================================================================
00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                          MtkSetRegionByGenericMapInfo                     =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================
00006 
00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00008                                    MISR
00009                                MISR Toolkit
00010 
00011             Copyright 2008, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrSetRegion.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include <stdlib.h>
00020 #include <math.h>
00021 #include "MisrToolkit.h"  /* Definition of inv_init */
00022 #include <proj.h>       /* Definition of MAXPROJ */
00023 
00037 MTKt_status MtkSetRegionByGenericMapInfo(
00038   const MTKt_GenericMapInfo *Map_info, 
00039   const MTKt_GCTPProjInfo *Proj_info,  
00040   int Path,                
00041   MTKt_Region *Region 
00042 ) 
00043 {
00044   MTKt_status status_code = MTK_FAILURE;      /* Return status of this function */
00045   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status of called routines. */
00046   MTKt_Region region_tmp = MTKT_REGION_INIT; 
00047                 /* Region */
00048   double corner_lat[4];     /* Latitude coordinates for each corner of the
00049                                    target map. */
00050   double corner_lon[4];     /* Longitude coordinates for each corner of the
00051                                    target map. */
00052   double min_som_x = 0.0;   /* Minimum SOM X coordinate. */
00053   double min_som_y = 0.0;   /* Minimum SOM Y coordinate. */
00054   double max_som_x = 0.0;   /* Maximum SOM X coordinate. */
00055   double max_som_y = 0.0;   /* Maximum SOM Y coordinate. */
00056   int i;            /* Loop iterator */
00057   double rad2deg = 180 / acos(-1); /* For converting Radians to degress */
00058 
00059   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00060   /* Argument check: Map_info == NULL                                   */
00061   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00062 
00063   if (Map_info == NULL) {
00064     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Map_info == NULL");
00065   }
00066 
00067   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00068   /* Argument check: Proj_info == NULL                                  */
00069   /*                 Proj_info->proj_code > MAXPROJ                     */
00070   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00071 
00072   if (Proj_info == NULL) {
00073     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Proj_info == NULL");
00074   }
00075   if (Proj_info->proj_code > MAXPROJ) {
00076     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Proj_info->proj_code > MAXPROJ");
00077   }
00078 
00079   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00080   /* Argument check: Region == NULL                                     */
00081   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00082 
00083   if (Region == NULL) {
00084     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Region == NULL");
00085   }
00086 
00087   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00088   /* Calculate lat/lon coordinates for each corner of the target map.   */
00089   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00090 
00091   { int iflg;           /* Status flag returned by GCTP. */
00092     int (*inv_trans[MAXPROJ+1])(); /* Array of transformation functions 
00093                    returned by GCTP. */
00094     
00095     inv_init(Proj_info->proj_code, Proj_info->zone_code, 
00096          (double *)Proj_info->proj_param, 
00097          Proj_info->sphere_code, 0, 0, &iflg, inv_trans);
00098     if (iflg) {
00099       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GCTP inv_init routine\n");
00100     }
00101 
00102     inv_trans[Proj_info->proj_code](Map_info->min_x, Map_info->min_y, 
00103                    &corner_lon[0], &corner_lat[0]);
00104     inv_trans[Proj_info->proj_code](Map_info->min_x, Map_info->max_y, 
00105                    &corner_lon[1], &corner_lat[1]);
00106     inv_trans[Proj_info->proj_code](Map_info->max_x, Map_info->min_y, 
00107                    &corner_lon[2], &corner_lat[2]);
00108     inv_trans[Proj_info->proj_code](Map_info->max_x, Map_info->max_y, 
00109                    &corner_lon[3], &corner_lat[3]);
00110   }
00111   
00112   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00113   /* Calculate SOM coordinates for each corner of the target map.       */
00114   /* Find the minimum and maximum SOM coords                            */
00115   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00116 
00117   for (i = 0 ; i < 4 ; i++) {
00118     double som_x;         /* SOM X coordinate for this corner. */ 
00119     double som_y;         /* SOM Y coordinate for each corner of the
00120                  target map. */
00121 
00122     status = MtkLatLonToSomXY(Path,
00123                   corner_lat[i]*rad2deg,
00124                   corner_lon[i]*rad2deg,
00125                   &som_x, &som_y);
00126     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00127 
00128     if (i == 0 || som_x < min_som_x) {
00129       min_som_x = som_x;
00130     }
00131     if (i == 0 || som_y < min_som_y) {
00132       min_som_y = som_y;
00133     }
00134     if (i == 0 || som_x > max_som_x) {
00135       max_som_x = som_x;
00136     }
00137     if (i == 0 || som_y > max_som_y) {
00138       max_som_y = som_y;
00139     }
00140   }
00141 
00142   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00143   /* Create region containing the target map area.                      */
00144   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00145 
00146   {
00147     double som_x_extent = max_som_x - min_som_x;
00148     double som_y_extent = max_som_y - min_som_y;
00149     
00150     double center_som_x = min_som_x + (max_som_x - min_som_x) / 2.0;
00151     double center_som_y = min_som_y + (max_som_y - min_som_y) / 2.0;
00152     double center_lat;
00153     double center_lon;
00154 
00155     status = MtkSomXYToLatLon(Path, center_som_x, center_som_y, &center_lat,
00156                   &center_lon);
00157     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00158 
00159     status = MtkSetRegionByLatLonExtent(center_lat, center_lon, 
00160                     som_x_extent, som_y_extent, "meters",
00161                     &region_tmp);
00162     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00163   }
00164 
00165 
00166   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00167   /* Return.                                                            */
00168   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00169 
00170   *Region = region_tmp;
00171   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00172 
00173 ERROR_HANDLE:
00174   return status_code;
00175 }
